nodes.bodyText: May be worth explicitly setting JOIN_FILTER_REWRITE_ENABLE_KEY to true here in case the default value changes in the future.
Should line 8863 use queryContext instead of QUERY_CONTEXT_DEFAULT?
nodes.diffHunk:

         + "FROM foo\n"
         + "INNER JOIN lookup.lookyloo l1 ON l1.k = foo.m1\n"
         + "INNER JOIN lookup.lookyloo l2 ON l2.k = l1.k",
+        queryContext,
